MAIN_PAGE.no_boards: У вас еще нет ни одной доски

WELCOME_PAGE.hero_subtitle: Easy to Start. Visual to Use. Great Solutions.

tools-section.title: Manage complex work easily
tools-section.list_descr1: Organize and assign tasks. With lists, teams see immediately what they need to do, which tasks are a priority, and when work is due.
tools-section.list_descr2: Make it easy for your team to focus on tasks currently at hand. Define each stage of work to see what/’s important and where things are getting stuck.
tools-section.list_descr3: PMA cards are your portal to more organized work—where every single part of your task can be managed, tracked, and shared with teammates.

about-section.title: О нас
about-section.description: The application is developed as part of an Angular course by Rolling Scopes School.
